title: emailing system
description: Using nodejs and nodemailer to develop a mailing system for a web application to send automatic newsletters, account verification emails, and password recuperation email

title: content managment system
description: Developing a Content Managment System and integrating a mulitple language support for the main website using ReactJs and Express

title: Subscription system
description: Creating a subscription system with basic CRUD operations for a video streaming website with ExpressJs and monogoDB

title: Netfilx clone
description: Building Netflix clone using React from frontend and the MDB API, I've build a proxy server using Express to provide an extra layer of security to hide the API Key

title: Chat application
description: Chatting application where users can log in to their account edit their information and uploaded their images to the server using express-fileupload and chat with their friends in real-time using Reactjs, ExpressJS, MongoDB, socket.io

title: WASM Gif generator
description: I Developed gif generator application which generates gif from videos uploaded from users using web assembly and ReactJs

title: E-commerce
description: E-commerce website where user can add their product to their carts and purchase them using Stripe. The frontend is made with ReactJs and the backend with Express and MongoDB
